articles.title: Thai Crown Prince Supports Korean People's Just Struggle
articles.content:
Thai Crown Prince Supports Korean People's Just Struggle
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Mun Song Mo, DPRK ambassador to Thailand, presented his credentials to Thai Crown Prince Maha Vajiralongkorn on August 14.
					 The crown prince said that the relations between Thailand and the DPRK are the long-standing and traditional relations of friendship and cooperation based on the spirit of mutual understanding, respect and cooperation, expressing belief that these relations would develop on a new high stage.
					
					 He fully supported the Korean people in their struggle for the prosperity of the country and the peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Institute for Security and Development Policy of Sweden led by Director Niklas Swanstrom visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 The guests laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Havana
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Havana
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Havana on August 13 on the occasion of the 88th birthday of Fidel Castro Ruz, leader of the Cuban revolution.
					 Present there on invitation were personages of the Communist Party, Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, Prensa Latina News Agency, Center of the Workers of Cuba and the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America and other officials concerned.
					
					 Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and his embassy officials were on hand.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Visit DPRK Mission
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Visit DPRK Mission
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Confederation of Koreans in Far East and Siberian Regions and the United Confederation of Koreans in Khabarovsk Territory visited the DPRK mission in Khabarovsk, Russia on Friday, the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They laid bouquets before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They handed over to the deputy consul general a congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un in the joint name of the Confederation of Koreans in Far East and Siberian Regions and the United Confederation of Koreans in Khabarovsk.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed before the grave of Kim Po Hyon, grandfather of President Kim Il Sung, in Mangyongdae on Tuesday, the 143rd anniversary of his birth.
					 Seen standing before the grave was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Ri Chol Man, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of party organs, ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.
					
					 A wreath was laid before the grave in the name of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Also laid there were wreaths in the name of ministries, national institutions, revolutionary schools, and party and power organs and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Po Hyon who put forward his family members to the revolutionary struggle for the country and its people and devoted himself to the country.

articles.title: National Youth Exhibition of Sci-Tech Achievements Opened
articles.content:
National Youth Exhibition of Sci-Tech Achievements Opened
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A national youth exhibition of sci-tech achievements opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Tuesday on the occasion of the Youth Day.
					 Displayed in the exhibition were lots of inventions and new technological innovation proposals made by young people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and those of the youth league and young scientists and technicians.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made an opening address.
					
					 He said that the exhibition would offer an important occasion to widely introduce the latest scientific and technological achievements gained in the youth science and technology march and mass technological innovation movement and generalize them and thus demonstrate the might of the Korean youth who are guaranteeing the building of a thriving nation with science and technology.

articles.title: National Students' Sports Tournament for September 5 Prize Closes
articles.content:
National Students' Sports Tournament for September 5 Prize Closes
 Hamhung, August 19 (KCNA) -- The National Students' Sports Tournament for September 5 Prize closed with due ceremony in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province on Tuesday.
					 Excellent players selected from universities and colleges across the country competed in defence sports, football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis and other events.
					
					 Pyongyang City placed first in the tournament while South Hamgyong Province second and North Hamgyong Province third.
					
					 Citations, cups, medals and prizes were awarded to organizations and players who proved successful at the tournament.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Prove Successful at Second Youth Olympic Games
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Prove Successful at Second Youth Olympic Games
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Pak Jong Ju Monday came first in the men's weightlifting 62kg category event at the Second Youth Olympic Games.
					 He lifted 120kg in snatch and 143kg in jerk, 263kg in total.
					
					Ri Song Gum and Jong Chun Hui placed second in the women's weightlifting 48kg and 53kg category events.
					
					 The games began in Nanjing, China on August 16.
					
					 They are bringing together men and women players from over 200 countries and regions.

articles.title: Traditions of Mt. Paektu Serve as Lifeline of Songun Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Traditions of Mt. Paektu Serve as Lifeline of Songun Korea: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu serve as the historic root of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution, blood vessel linking their lineage and eternal banner of victory of Songun Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 Fully reflected in the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu are the most correct guiding idea of the revolution, indomitable revolutionary spirit, precious revolutionary feats and experience of struggle provided in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle and the revolutionary and popular work method and work style, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea that the popular masses are the master of revolution and they promote the revolution and construction for the first time in history, and led the arduous anti-Japanese war to victory under the unfurled banner of independence. Flunkeyism and dogmatism were rejected and national chauvinism was smashed in the bloody and decisive resistance against the brigandish Japanese imperialists, and the ideological system of Juche and the indomitable revolutionary spirit, the foundation of the revolutionary traditions of the WPK, were provided in the course of firmly adhering to the independent stand. The charge spirit, stout fighting spirit and spirit of independence to liberate the country and build a socialist paradise with one's own efforts were the life and soul of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters.
					
					 The revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu serve as a powerful weapon which helps bring earlier the final victory with the precious revolutionary feats and experience of struggle of the leader.
					
					 The revolutionary traditions provided by the President and glorified by leader Kim Jong Il are fully reflecting the scientific and revolutionary methods of struggle.
					
					 The WPK is the great party which is firmly defending the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu, carrying forward and developing them and leading the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will dynamically fight toward the day of the final victory, taking the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu as the eternal lifeline of Songun Korea under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Reacting to Nuclear Threat and War in Kind Is Counteraction: Papers
articles.content:
Reacting to Nuclear Threat and War in Kind Is Counteraction: Papers
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. deployed forward three B-2s belonging to the 509th bombing flying corps on Guam from an air force base in Missouri State, the U.S. It is saying that the forward-deploy of these B-2s on Guam is aimed to stage a regular drill.
					 Commenting on this, papers Tuesday says: It is nothing but a deceptive scheme to conceal its sinister attempt, and B-2s aim at the DPRK.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the U.S. deployed forward on Guam B-2s it regards as the main means for preemptive strike before the kick-off of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises in south Korea, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the mode of counteraction of the DPRK to react to nuclear threat and war in kind.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the U.S. singled out the DPRK as the target of its preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 It has been a fait accompli that the U.S. tries to inflict nuclear disaster on the Korean people at any cost, and it is not worth serious discussion.
					
					 Peace is not protected by words. It can be defended by powerful physical strength, war deterrence only.
					
					 We are fully ready to stand against the U.S. The rights of option and action are not monopolies of the U.S.
					
					 Minju Joson says it is the unanimous stand of the army and people of the DPRK to react to the U.S. ever-increasing nuclear threat and blackmail with powerful nuclear deterrence for self-defence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Kick-off of UFG Frontal Challenge to DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Kick-off of UFG Frontal Challenge to DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The kick-off of Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military drills is a frontal challenge to the sincere efforts of the DPRK for mending the north-south relations and achieving the peace and defusing tensions on the Korean peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It says:
					
					 This is a product of the extreme confrontation of the south Korean war-like forces to ignite a war against the north with the backing of foreign forces, obsessed with the extreme hostility towards fellow countrymen, indifferent to the peace on the peninsula and the improved north-south relations.
					
					 UFG is an intolerable military provocation as it is seriously threatening the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and disturbing the peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 Whenever the south Korean puppet trigger-happy forces staged north-targeted war drills, the inter-Korean ties were driven into a catastrophic phase and the situation on the peninsula was pushed to an extreme pitch of strain.
					
					 It is a sinister attempt of the U.S. and south Korean puppet military war-like forces to lead the military pressure upon the DPRK to an adventurous preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					 A nuclear war on the peninsula is becoming a serious realistic issue.
					
					 No one can know when and how it breaks out.
					
					 It is natural that under the prevailing serious situation the DPRK is reacting to the frantic nuclear war provocations of the hostile forces with its strong military deterrence steps.
					
					 We have already declared solemnly that all the aggressor forces to be involved in the UFG, military bases in south Korea and overseas, White House, Pentagon, Chongwadae and other bases of aggression and provocation would become the targets of the strategic and tactical rockets and other high-performance ultramodern ultra-precision fire strike means of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, it will not be limited to the peninsula, and it is a matter of time that the strongholds of aggression and provocation will be reduced to ashes. It is no empty word.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms S. Korean Chief Executive's "Celebration Speech" Mockery to Nation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms S. Korean Chief Executive's "Celebration Speech" Mockery to Nation
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- On Friday the south Korean chief executive in a "celebration speech" played a wordplay, talking about "formation of environment community" and "formation of living community" while not mentioning the basic issues for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday terms it an unbearable mockery and insult to the whole nation aspiring after the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and independent reunification.
					
					 The north-south relations are being bedeviled and the danger of a war is increasing on the Korean peninsula due to the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen by the south Korean authorities following the U.S., the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 For the south Korean authorities to stop such moves is a prerequisite and essential requirement for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. In other words, the south Korean chief executive's "celebration speech" sparked off only disillusion among people as she repeated the preceding stand for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 She played a wordplay as if she were interested in mending the inter-Korean relations but it reminded people of the proverb saying that an empty can sounds louder. In the long run, her real intention to improve her image driven into a tight corner due to the ferry Sewol disaster and the case of the murder of private first class Yun and tide over the ruling crisis had a boomerang effect.
					
					 If she sincerely wants the improved inter-Korean relations, she should halt north-targeted nuclear war maneuvers being staged in league with the U.S., pull down the legal and institutional barriers such as the ill-famed "Security Law" and "May 24 step" barring the national reconciliation and unity and make a decision for implementing the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 The wordplay without such practical steps will bring nothing good to the nation.

articles.title: US Troops Had Better Quit South Korea in Good Time: KCNA
articles.content:
US Troops Had Better Quit South Korea in Good Time: KCNA
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Public in the U.S. is becoming increasingly vocal demanding the withdrawal of U.S. troops from south Korea. 
					 A U.S. institute for strategic studies in its report "The future of the U.S. army. Is its overseas presence still important?" said that U.S. forces' presence in south Korea proves not effective and on the contrary they may fall victim to other side.
					
					 Such voices are heard from the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies, and other institutes and bodies and figures of political circles and military and Republicans.
					
					 A researcher at the U.S. naval academy commented that U.S. forces present in south Korea are bound to make north Korea aim at the U.S. and the magazine Forbes also called for the pullback of U.S. forces from south Korea, asserting that they are not sufficient to cope with the nuclear attack from north Korea and are becoming unnecessary nuclear hostages.
					
					 These are comments made on the basis of accurate scientific analysis of the DPRK's deterrence for self-defense.
					
					 The DPRK's deterrence for self-defense is fully ready to react to the U.S. nuclear blackmail with merciless nuclear attack and to a war of aggression with an all-out just war.
					
					 It is ready to strike military bases in the U.S. mainland, the citadel of aggression, and Hawaii, Guam and other operational theatres in the Pacific, U.S. military bases in south Korea and protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation, should the U.S. recklessly starts a war with huge strategic forces involved. 
					
					 The DPRK has already declared, not concealing anything, that if it strikes the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime, they will be hit hard, reducing big and small strongholds of aggression to ashes and its deterrence for self-defense is fully ready to do so.
					
					 The Korean People's Army conducted drills for firing rockets at the mock bases of U.S. troops in south Korea, fully displaying the combat capabilities of the firepower units and the performance of tactical rockets and once again powerfully demonstrating its military muscle.
					
					 It is crystal clear that the U.S. forces in south Korea will be the primary targets of the KPA and face its punishment in case a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks that it can protect its troops and the south Korean puppet army with its "nuclear umbrella" in south Korea, its colony, at a time when it is busy taking steps to defend its mainland from the high-performance nuclear and missile strikes of the KPA.
					
					 The U.S. is driven into a tight corner because it is stuck in the shambles of wars of aggression started by it in different parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S. is staggering as it is heavily indebted due to its excessive arms buildup and the serious economic and financial crises.
					
					 A change has taken place in the balance of forces due to the rapidly changing situation in Northeast Asia and the political and economic interests among countries and regions. This has made a breach in the U.S. strategy towards the DPRK to hurl its junior allies into putting pressure upon it. 
					
					 This cannot but be a telling blow at the U.S. in its efforts to implement its hegemonic foreign policy towards Northeast Asia centering around the Korean peninsula and perpetuate its troops' presence in south Korea.
					
					 The reality clearly indicates that the U.S. should make a decision to pull its troops from south Korea as soon as possible to save itself from its financial crisis and ensure peace and stability on the peninsula and in the region.
					
					 It is the demand of the trend of the times to pull the U.S. troops from south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. had better quit south Korea in good time, properly understanding the changed strategic environment and the trend of the times, away from its outdated mode of thinking.

articles.title: KCNA Demands Ouster of Traitor Kim Kwan Jin
articles.content:
KCNA Demands Ouster of Traitor Kim Kwan Jin
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are busy shielding Kim Kwan Jin chiefly to blame for human rights abuses in the puppet army.
					 The ruling conservative group is letting loose a spate of rigmaroles, claiming that it is an act of threatening the state security to demand reshuffle of the chief of the security office of Chongwadae and Kim might be unaware of violence.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet national assembly and ministry of Defense are busy setting up new mechanisms for "improving the human rights in the army."
					
					 This is nothing but a deceptive artifice to gloss over the demand of the south Korean people for judging Kim Kwan Jin.
					
					 As widely reported, the south Korean public is becoming increasingly vocal demanding the punishment of Kim Kwan Jin who was the puppet minister of Defense at that time over the murder of private first class Yun. 
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin received a detailed report on the said case when he was holding the post of the minister of Defense but did not take any proper measure instead of severely punishing the assailants.
					
					 He put some pressure upon the prosecutors in the military who were investigating the case in a bid to cover up the truth about human rights abuses.
					
					 Kim is chiefly to blame for turning the puppet army into a group of gangsters without equals and hordes of beasts.
					
					 In those days he turned the whole army into a group of maniacs for confrontation with fellow countrymen and imbued its service members with extreme misanthropy and brutality, crying out for establishing the military discipline to prepare the army as a combat type army capable of winning a victory in the fight with the north. He openly stirred up the brutal disciplinary punishment and violence prevalent in the puppet army.
					
					 When a beating case occurred in the puppet marine corps in 2011, he misled the public opinion by creating impression that such brutality was committed due to the wrong conception that "you should be beaten because I was beaten". This was his desperate bid to hide his crimes.
					
					 It was because of evil deeds of Kim that junior soldiers of the puppet army are subject to beating and violence by their superiors and are forced to lick even spit and toilet bowls.
					
					 Last year alone, more than 45,000 service members became disabled due to disciplinary punishment in the puppet army and at least 2,000 of them deserted the barracks.
					
					 70 percent of the dead service members of the army chose suicide, unable to endure violence. 
					
					 That is why people of various circles in south Korea are condemning Kim and strongly demanding severe punishment of him.
					
					 The puppet chief executive is zealously shielding him for fear that ouster of Kim may drive her to another ruling crisis. But this is nothing but a foolish act.
					
					 Her act of zealously harboring Kim would be little short of admitting herself that the present regime is nothing but a regime abusing human rights and one of killers and this would spark off a more serious ruling crisis.
					
					 The root cause of misfortune should be rooted out before it is too late. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should face up to the reality and bring Kim Kwan Jin to a court at once.

articles.title: More Data on Atrocities Committed by Japanese Imperialists Disclosed
articles.content:
More Data on Barbarous Atrocities Committed by Japanese Imperialists Disclosed
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- KBS of south Korea on August 17 reported about the disclosure of more data on hair-raising atrocities committed by the Japanese imperialists during World War II.
					 Unit 731 of the Imperial Japanese Army, an ill-famed germ warfare unit stationed in Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, China, spread a lot of rats it had used for germ cultivation in different places and germ on grain before their defeat in 1945. As a result, pest quickly spread around the area where it was stationed, leaving at least 7,000 persons dead.
					
					 It was disclosed by a U.S. document that the Japanese imperialists stationed in different parts of Marshall Islands in 1945 killed Koreans who were drafted for labor conscription and ate their flesh.
					
					 The tests conducted by them on bodies of POWs were disclosed by the recorded interrogation made by an army surgeon of the Imperial Japanese Army who witnessed the atrocity at that time. 
					
					 Reporting about this fact, the broadcasting service said such tests conducted on POWs by the Imperial Japanese Army during the war were too horrible to believe that it was done by human beings.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism and Stage Comeback to Korea Opposed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism and Stage Comeback to Korea Opposed
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The August 15 pilgrim group of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Friday in protest against the moves of Japan to revive militarism and stage a comeback to Korea.
					 In a statement it accused Japan of officially expressing the stand that it would exercise the "right to collective self-defense" by reinterpreting the Pacifist Constitution. This should be dropped as it is a very dangerous action, it noted.
					
					 It urged the present "government" to opt for preventing Japan from reviving militarism and staging a comeback to Korea.

articles.title: More Soldiers Commit Suicides in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
More Soldiers Commit Suicides in S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- More soldiers committed suicides in the south Korean puppet army, sparking off great uproar, in the wake of a recent murder of a private first class due to harsh violence perpetrated by his superiors.
					 Two corporals committed suicides together on August 11 in the 28th Division of the puppet army in which the case of the murder of a private first class had occurred.
					
					 At a house of a corporal in Seoul they hanged themselves to death, leaving suicide note to the effect that it was unbearably painful to serve in the army. 
					
					 Next day a private first class shot himself to death at a firing range of an engineering unit under the command of the puppet Third Army Corps.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Slammed for Kicking off Racket to "Eliminate Followers of North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Slammed for Kicking off Racket to "Eliminate Followers of North"
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on August 15 in an editorial denounced the puppet prosecution for kicking off an anachronistic racket to "eliminate followers of the north".
					 The racket is aimed to suppress and exclude the people and make society veer to ultra-right, the editorial said, adding the "yusin" dictatorship is repeating itself in the 21st century.
					
					 South Korea is turning into an ultra-right society with the prosecution as a feeler, it charged.

articles.title: Halt to UFG Demanded by Organizations, Opposition Party of S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to UFG Demanded by Organizations, Opposition Party of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- At least 30 south Korean organizations including those for peace against war and for reunification and labor movement and those of youth, students, women and religionists, and the Unified Progressive Party held a joint press conference in Seoul on August 18 denouncing Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 UFG is a high-intensity offensive training to mount a preemptive attack on the north, the organizations and the party said.
					
					 It is aimed to establish south Korea-U.S.-Japan missile defense system and form a triangular military alliance in a bid to satisfy the military and strategic understanding of the U.S. and Japan, they noted.
					
					 Meanwhile, civic and public organizations in Iksan area, North Jolla Province held a press conference outside the Iksan City Office on the same day at which they demanded a halt to the joint military exercises increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and a conclusion of a peace agreement.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK held a meeting on Aug. 13 to celebrate the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Foreign Ministry of Russia, Korean War Veterans' Council, Koryo Medical Centre and the association and masses.
					
					 Invited there were staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the association, made a speech. He said:
					
					 The Korean people unfolded a protracted struggle for national liberation in colony against the Japanese imperialists under the leadership of the President and finally liberated the country.
					
					 They also worked a miracle defeating the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and honorably protected the national sovereignty.
					
					 As it was led by the President and Kim Jong Il, the DPRK emerged a country with powerful national power, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and a satellite manufacturing and launching state though the imperialists worked hard to blockade it.
					
					 Nothing can block the Korean people's advance for justice.
					
					 The DPRK is a model to be followed by progressive humankind.
					
					 I sincerely wish the Korean people greater successes in their struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and building a thriving socialist nation under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Vice-Chairman of the association Yuri Vanin said August 15 is a common holiday of the peoples of Russia and the DPRK. He went on: The Russia-DPRK friendship is unbreakable as it was forged and has been developed in the course of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 The feats the President and Kim Jong Il performed by developing the traditional Russia-DPRK relations of friendship will be everlasting. 
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in India, Nigeria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in India, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show in India and a photo exhibition and film show in Nigeria on Aug. 7 and 13 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on show were books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "The Arch of Triumph", "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 B. C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, said in a speech:
					
					 The President, who embarked on the road of the revolution in his teens with a high aim for Korea's independence, proposed the line for achieving national liberation through armed struggle and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) on April 25, 1932. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists claimed that the KPRA is a drop in the ocean, but the President beat down them, who dreamed of the world domination, with his original strategies and superb guerilla war methods and liberated Korea.
					
					 The feats he performed by liberating Korea through the arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle will go down forever in the history of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.
					
					 At the event in Nigeria speakers praised the President for liberating Korea, adding that the DPRK is displaying the dignity as a socialist country centered on the popular masses and an invincible country unfazed by any storm.

articles.title: British Organizations Laud Kim Il Sung's Feats in Liberating Korea
articles.content:
British Organizations Laud Kim Il Sung's Feats in Liberating Korea
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK and other progressive organizations of Britain made public a joint statement on August 6 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Korea was liberated from the outrageous Japanese imperialists' colonial rule on August 15, 1945 thanks to the anti-Japanese armed struggle organized by President Kim Il Sung, the sun of the nation and gifted strategist.
					
					 Under his guidance the Korean People's Revolutionary Army staged the armed struggle without state-backing home front in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, guided by the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 He resolutely rejected flunkeyism and independently waged the armed struggle by relying on the strength of the Korean people.
					
					 The victory in the anti-Japanese armed struggle proved in practice the truth of the Songun idea that national liberation can be achieved by the armed struggle only.
					
					 This victory greatly encouraged the peoples of the colonial countries in their struggle for national independence.
					
					 The shining victory in the anti-Japanese armed struggle helped the Korean people be liberated from the colonial rule of the ferocious Japanese imperialists and lead a new independent life, new hopeful life.
					
					 Now the Korean people are working hard to firmly protect the gains of the revolution, build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the reunification of the country under the ever-victorious Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC denuncia locuras de Kerry
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC denuncia locuras de Kerry
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC en relacion con que el secretario de Estado norteamericano Kerry expuso abiertamente el intento de aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea so pretexto del "problema de DDHH", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Recientemente, en un discurso explicativo de la "politica sobre Asia" de EE.UU., hecho en Hawai, Kerry maldijo sobre el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					Fuera de su deber, ese tipejo nos acuso repitiendo los datos falsificados sin fundamento, lo que es una expresion mas abierta de la negacion morbida y la arraigada politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					Tal hecho ocurrido en visperas de los ejercicios militares EE.UU.- Sur de Corea Ulji Freedom Guardian, parte de una intencion politica malsana de manchar a toda costa la imagen de la RPDC para dar a conocer en la palestra internacional que el regimen de la RPDC es un objeto a ser eliminado militarmente y justificar sus amenazas militares.
					
					En los ultimos anos, el imperio recurre freneticamente a los alborotos de "DDHH" anti-RPDC no para mejorar verdaderamente "DDHH" sino para derrocar el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Dado que fue evidenciada la imposibilidad de arrodillarnos con el problema nuclear, EE.UU. moviliza mas el medio de presion que es el "problema de DDHH".
					
					En nuestro pais, las masas populares siendo verdaderas duenas del pais disfrutan de autenticos derechos y los derechos humanos estan garantizados por las leyes del Estado.
					
					Tenemos la voluntad de cooperar con otros paises para mejorar mas los derechos humanos de las masas populares.
					
					Pero, no toleraremos la intencion de abusar del problema de DDHH como medio de presion para derrumbar nuestro regimen.
					
					Como ya hemos frustrado a cada paso las maniobras de EE.UU. de aislarnos y aplastarnos bajo el pretexto del problema nuclear, tambien en el futuro, nos enfrentaremos con la campana de "DDHH" de EE.UU. adhiriendose a nuestros principios y nuestro modo.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a Kim Po Hyon por el aniversario de su natalicio
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a Kim Po Hyon por el aniversario de su natalicio
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 143o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Po Hyon, abuelo del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fueron colocadas el dia 19 las ofrendas florales ante su tumba en Mangyongdae. 
					Alli estaba colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, el vicepremier Ri Chol Man, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, ministerios y organos centrales y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Ante la tumba fueron depositadas una ofrenda floral a nombre del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y las otras a nombre de ministerios, organos centrales, escuela revolucionaria e instituciones del partido y el poder y granjas de esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de la vida de Kim Po Hyon quien envio a sus hijos a la lucha revolucionaria por la patria y el pueblo y dedico todo lo suyo por el pais.

articles.title: Respondera con arma nuclear a arma nuclear y con guerra a guerra, insisten periodicos coreanos
articles.content:
Respondera con arma nuclear a arma nuclear y con guerra a guerra, insisten periodicos coreanos
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos dispuso en la isla Guam 3 bombarderos estrategicos B-2 adscritos al corps de bombarderos no. 509 que estaban anidados en una base de las fuerzas aereas del Estado Missouri. 
					 En la actualidad, EE.UU. habla tanto de que dicha disposicion es para el  entrenamiento normal.
					
					  Pero, esto no pasa de ser una artimana para encubrir su intento malsano, y el objeto de estos bombarderos es claramente la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Asi revelan los periodicos capitalinos en sus comentarios individuales divulgados este martes.
					
					  El diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que lo comprueba el hecho de que EE.UU. dispuso en la isla Guam estos tres bombarderos considerados como medio principal para el ataque preventivo en vispera de los ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian que se libran en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Responder con las armas nucleares a las armas nucleares y con la guerra a la guerra, esto es el modo de enfrentamiento de la RPDC.
					
					  Ya es conocido por todo el mundo el hecho de que EE.UU. fijo la RPDC como objeto de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					  El que el imperio intenta imponer a toda costa al pueblo coreano la calamidad nuclear, es el hecho establecido y no hay motivo de discutirlo mas.
					
					  La paz se defiende no con las palabras sino con las poderosas fuerzas fisicas, o sea con el disuasivo de guerra.
					
					  Ya hicimos todos los preparativos para enfrentarse a EE.UU.
					
					  El derecho de escoger y actuar lo no tiene solo EE.UU.
					
					  El periodico Minju Joson tambien destaca que responder con el fuerte disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo a los cada vez mas graves amenazas y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU., es la invariable posicion del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.

articles.title: Discurso conmemorativo de Park Geun-hye es burla e insulto a la nacion, censura Minju Joson
articles.content:
Discurso conmemorativo de Park Geun-hye es burla e insulto a la nacion, censura Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ACNC) -- En el "discurso conmemorativo" del dia 15, la mandataria surcoreana presento los asuntos insignificantes como la "formacion de las comunidades del ambiente y la vida" dejando a un lado los temas fundamentales para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas.
					 Esto deviene la burla e insulto intolerables a toda la nacion coreana aspirante a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion independiente.
					
					 Asi condena el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					 En estos dias, las relaciones N-S se tornan mas graves y en la Peninsula Coreana se aumenta el peligro del estallido de guerra, lo cual se debe a las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de las autoridades surcoreanas obedientes a Estados Unidos.
					
					  Cesar tales maniobras deviene la condicion previa y la demanda indispensable para la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  En una palabra el "discurso conmemorativo" de la mandataria surcoreana siendo repeticion de la anterior posicion conflictiva causo solo el chasco entre los habitantes.
					
					  Aunque ella dedico un cuarto de su discurso al tema de las relaciones N-S y dijo como si tuviera interes en la mejora de las relaciones, esto solo recuerda a los habitantes el refran: el tonel vacio mete mas ruido.
					
					  Esta vez, surtio el efecto contraproducente la intencion de la mandataria surcoreana de elevar su rescate bajado debido al incidente de hundimiento del barco Sewol y el caso de asesinato al soldado Yun y evitar la grave  crisis de gobernacion.
					
					  Si desea de verdad la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, la gobernadora surcoreana no debe recurrir a las palabras inutiles sino tomar la decision de cesar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte que se libran en contubernio con EE.UU., eliminar las murallas legales e institucionales como la infame "ley de seguridad" y las "medidas del 24 de mayo" que impiden la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					  El chisme al margen de tales medidas practicas es totalmente inutil y danino.
